topic.title: Date Picker Form Control
topic.shortdesc: The oxy_datePicker built-in form control is used for offering a text field with a calendar browser that allows the user to choose a certain date in a specified format.

body.note: To insert a sample of the oxy_datePicker form control in a CSS file (or LESS file), invoke the Content Completion Assistant by pressing and select the oxy_datePicker code template.
